entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as grunting and believing Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character. He is mentioned as being bitter and assuming Hagrid was talking about the skrewts.

entities.name: skrewts
entities.description: Skrewts are magical creatures that have developed armor and become powerful.

relationships.description: Hagrid believes Dumbledore believes Harry's innocence.
